וְיָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> season רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> Now for a long לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel לְלֹ֣א ׀ <S%H3808><s%> [hath been] without אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֱמֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> the true וּלְלֹ֛א <S%H3808><s%> and without כֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> priest מוֹרֶ֖ה <S%H3384><s%> and without a teaching וּלְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and without תוֹרָֽה׃ <S%H8451><s%> and without law
